head.title: 3-13-20 COVID-19 Update - Argyle Central School District

meta.content: Although No Argyle students or staff members have been diagnosed with coronavirus, we feel it is best to assess school gatherings, extra-curricular activities, and field trips with an abundance of caution and make decisions about cancellations on a case-by-case basis.

meta.content: Although No Argyle students or staff members have been diagnosed with coronavirus, we feel it is best to assess school gatherings, extra-curricular activities, and field trips with an abundance of caution and make decisions about cancellations on a case-by-case basis.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;color: rgb(40, 40, 40);;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

span.span: continue to work with our local and state health departments for accurate and timely information and guidance concerning the

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;color: rgb(40, 40, 40);;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

span.span: spread of COVID-19 virus, we will continue to update you with information as it becomes available.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

p.span: Although No Argyle students or staff members have been diagnosed with COVID-19, we feel it is best to assess school gatherings, extra-curricular activities, and field trips with an abundance of caution and make decisions about cancellations on a case-by-case basis.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

span.span: That being said, the district will suspend all

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

span.span: field trips outside of Argyle through the end of March.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

span.span: Over the course of this month, and as more info develops, we'll make decisions about our scheduled

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

span.span: school gatherings, extra-curricular activities, and field trips scheduled

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

p.span: We will continue to update you on how the coronavirus situation will affect our district. I also

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

span.span: encourage everyone to obtain information from reliable sources including

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

a.span: New York State Department of Health

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-family: "times new roman";;font-size: 12pt;

p.span: Please continue to check our website and your email for updates from the district about other cancellations or postponements of school-related events.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;
